title: Aarya Diamond Floral Stud Earrings
features: Floral design with a central diamond cluster surrounded by radiating diamond petals. The openwork setting allows light to enhance the diamonds' brilliance. Vintillu (small circle) pattern adds a delicate touch. Features hand craftsmanship and traditional filigree elements.
colors: Warm yellow gold and brilliant white diamonds.
occasions: or as a subtle yet elegant addition to traditional South Indian attire. Suitable for everything from a Seemantham ceremony to a modern cocktail party.
description: These diamond studs offer a timeless elegance, blending classic floral motifs with the brilliance of modern diamond cutting. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, while the intricate filigree work showcases superior craftsmanship. Their versatility makes them a valuable addition to any jewelry collection.
